name: Poro Endless Runner
description:
Controls: 
On PC: Space to jump
On mobile: Tap to jump

Description:
This was one of my earliest games. The art is recycled from a prior project. The reason I decided to make this game was to test whether it would be practical to have a randomiser running which picks a number corresponding to a pre-made section of track. I am pretty happy with the outcome and I feel that, with more time put into making more interesting and varied track segments, this is an idea which I may revisit for future games.
